comments.body: I assume this pulls in some logger and if we don't do this, logging is a no-op. Isn't the latter what we want to avoid noise?

This is to avoid noise in the output of the test 
```
SLF4J: Failed to load class "org.slf4j.impl.StaticLoggerBinder".
SLF4J: Defaulting to no-operation (NOP) logger implementation
SLF4J: See http://www.slf4j.org/codes.html#StaticLoggerBinder for further details.
```

The engine does not log anything, then I do not think it should not have any impact. 
Feel free to ignore this suggestion if you think it is better.

Also it should be better to add 
```
 runtime_deps = [
        "@maven//:ch_qos_logback_logback_classic",
    ],
```
instead of the suggestion above.

diffHunk:

         "//daml-lf/language",

 )
+
+daml_compile(
+    name = "CollectAuthority",
+    srcs = ["src/perf/resources/damls/CollectAuthority.daml"],
+    visibility = ["//visibility:public"],
+)
+
+da_scala_benchmark_jmh(
+    name = "scenario-perf",

+    data = [

+    ],
